text: Fuyuko, take a drink if you'd like.

Ah, this is that soda that just came out. You know, the one you 
were struggling to decide about buying earlier.
It seemed like you really wanted to try it, so I got one for you.

......Hmmmm
And you thought doing that would make Fuyu happy.

H-Huh...?
Was my research lacking again?
I wonder, do you think it was lacking?

...Just kidding.
Since you had good intentions, I'll graciously accept this.
